attributes.action: Stop the sale of Halal meat to unsuspecting non muslims
attributes.additional_details: It seems that most supermarkets are selling halal meat and a lot of people don't even know it. There is even some evidence that produce with the Red Tractor logo is also halal.
attributes.background: I'm a British Christian who believes in the Christian way of life and would very much like to continue recognising our country as a Christian country.
